#Text=The Indiana Pacers ( 23 - 33 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 43 - 10 ) 106 - 98 on Sunday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis .
#Text=Despite being down 38 - 26 after the first quarter , the Pacers made a statement in the second , out - scoring the Warriors 34 - 19 to finish the half .
#Text=After taking the lead in the second , they were able to hold on throughout the rest of the game and secure the win over an extremely tough opponent in front of their home crowd .

#Text=The Pacers were the superior shooters in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors went just 38 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep .
#Text=The Pacers ' saw a huge contribution from their bench Sunday , with 63 of their 106 points coming off the bench .
#Text=Rodney Stuckey led that charge , going 11 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 30 points , while also adding five assists .
#Text=He 's come out of the All-Star break on fire , recording two 30 - point games in a row , as he 's been a huge reason for the Pacers recent success .
#Text=C.J .
#Text=Watson was another one of those bench players who got hot and finished with 14 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and five assists in 26 minutes .
#Text=He had failed to reach double figures in three straight games prior to Sunday , so it was good to see him get back on track .
#Text=For the starters , George Hill and C.J .
#Text=Miles were the only relatively effective players .

#Text=Miles posted 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and nine rebounds , including a clutch three - pointer to put the Pacers up four points with less than a minute left in the game , while Hill added 12 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and a pair of assists .
#Text=The Pacers ' guards did all the work in this one , and it paid off with a win .
#Text=Quite uncharacteristicly , the Warriors struggled to get going , with only two players reaching double - digits in points .

#Text=With Stephen Curry sitting out , Klay Thompson did far - and - away the most damage for the Warriors , finishing with a game - high of 39 points , as he went 12 - for - 28 from the field and 5 - for - 13 from the three - point line .
#Text=He also was able to get to the free throw line 10 times , converting on a perfect 10 - of - 10 .
#Text=He 's played well since returning from the All-Star break , combining for 59 points over his last two games .
#Text=Andre Iguodala was the only other significant offensive contributor , posting 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and four assists in 32 minutes off the bench .
#Text=It was his second straight game with 14 points , despite averaging only 7 points per game on the season .
#Text=Also off the bench , David Lee chipped in with six points and 12 rebounds .
#Text=The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Washington Wizards on Tuesday , while the Pacers will travel to Oklahoma City to play the Thunder on Tuesday .
